```{r setup, include=TRUE}
library(DBI)
library(dbplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(duckdb)

dbplyr::copy_nycflights13(con)
flights <- tbl(con, "flights")
planes <- tbl(con, "planes")
```

### 22.5.9

---

1.

```{r}
flights |> 
distinct() |> 
  show_query()

flights |> 
head() |> 
  show_query()
```

2.

```{r}

flights |> 
  filter(dep_delay < arr_delay) |> 
  show_query()

```

```{r}

flights |> 
  mutate(
    speed = distance / (air_time / 60)
  ) |> 
  show_query()

```
